website_summaries.verdict: Excellent quality for a multiple-person ice fishing shelter that fits in an easy-to-carry bag.
pros: Provides room for 5 to 7 people with dimensions of 115 by 115 inches and a comfortable height of 78 inches
Has doors on either end of the shelter, making it easier to exit and enter the tent
Reasonable price, considering how much coverage area you're receiving
cons: Has insulation, but it could be warmer and better able to withstand wet weather

customer_reviews.title: Stitching for support pole pockets failing after one time use.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item from Amazon in January. Used once. My Son and I set it up this past week to clean and air it out. Found three of the pole pockets where the support poles were literally pushing through the stitching. Spent well over 350 dollars for a tent that I’ve used ONCE. emailed Eskimo with photos and have not yet received a response. Very disappointed in the stitching for the support pile pockets. Hope they stand behind their product. UPDATE: No questions asked...Artisam replaced the shelter immediately. Had a new shelter shipped to my house free of charge the same week. Hoping the new shelter holds up.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Leaks and missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shelter but it has issues....the one I received wasn’t waterproof, the skirt corners ripped and was missing ties down straps....called Eskimo customer support and was told that my shelter doesn’t come with 2 tie down straps/cords even though it’s listed under product specifications on their website. Customer service reps were not helpful or friendly like amazon customer service people. Was told that what the tie down straps were an optional add on and that I would need to pay for those. Won’t be recommending this product or the company to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: AllThingsPNR

customer_reviews.title: After the second time of putting the tent together, ...
customer_reviews.text: After the second time of putting the tent together, one of the hubs cracked and the upper rod feel out. I managed to get it out back together but it won’t stay in. I called Eskimos customer service and it is a joke. Two different 20 minute calls and two unanswered emails. After a weeks wait, I hoped that someone would get back but nothing yet.
customer_reviews.author: John Gazzillo

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS SHACK!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We started out with a smaller shack and moved up to this larger one. So glad we bought the insulated version. Lots of room for 2 people and all our toys. Love all the windows, they are a good size and open and close easily. Love having the 2 doors also! The netting for storage inside is perfect for hats, mittens, scarves, and things you don't want to set on the ice. Also has air vents which we have actually used on warm days with lots of sun. Great product with easy setup and so easy to transport. Pops up quickly and folds down quickly as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Easy up, easy down
customer_reviews.text: HUGE inside, 4 BIG people can fish in this with plenty of elbow room. Lots of light through the windows when you want it and the insulated version that I purchased stayed warm. Had to turn the heater down. Easy up, easy down. I do recommend however purchasing the Eskimo drill adapter for the steaks, they are very aggressive and difficult to put in by hand but they really hold well.
customer_reviews.author: SEF

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice Shanty for Several People
customer_reviews.text: We needed an ice fishing tent for when the whole family is around. This one is great! A bit heavy and awkward to carry, but the guys take turns if we don't use the four wheeler. Don't be fooled by the video- it goes up much easier with two guys. We got the insulated one and it is really cozy with our small Buddy Heater at 20 degrees. Two doors are very nice feature too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Well made. But while I was waiting for it to arrive the weather warmed up enough to spoil the ice. The only use it had was a setup on my deck to check it out. Looking forward to next winter's freeze up to put it to use on Canyon Ferry Reservoir in Montana.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie

customer_reviews.title: Nicely designed shelter
customer_reviews.text: Eskimo shelters are a bit pricey but the quality throughout its design and construction is obvious. It is very easy to set and tear down. My wife enjoys ice fishing more because of the sheltering from wind and sun. "Happy wife..."---...you know what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: Yoboslayer

customer_reviews.title: Big Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This ice shanty is huge! Plenty of space to fit 4 adults with 2 holes a piece and each with vexillars and humminbirds, plus all your gear. Tie downs work great when the wind blows. Lots of windows that velcro open and shut, 2 doors with extra big zippers, lots of webbing to hang and keep things in place. Easily pops into shape and just as easily pops down. With practice, one person can learn to put it away in its case easily, but its a learning curve at first. My family and friends have had so fun with this shanty out on the ice, 10 outta 10, AAA+++
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set Up, Well Made, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. Insulated is the way to go! Buy some floor mats to create an insulated floor. The 2 'x 2' interlocking foam mats that are used in many home exercise rooms, work extremely well as a floor for this Hub Shelter. Simply remove the tiles where you want to have your holes. Above that, this Hub is excellent so far and it is well made. I'm looking forward to many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Juloren

customer_reviews.title: It's also good for winter snow camping.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in November 2019 and intended it for winter snow camping. My family used it to snow camp in Mammoth Lakes over the New Year holiday. It worked quite well. Because it does not have a floor, cold air does come in through the bottom brims. But it is not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: I WILL ADVERTISE THIS PRODUCT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately enough for you review buyers, I have endured this man-made masterpiece and may I tell you.....buy it. This thing withstood 30mph winds on lake Winnipesaukee in NH during the mid Winter. I have a single burner Mr. Buddy heater with whipping winds. Warm enough to be comfortable. Children in those winds no....children with a single burner Mr. Buddy heater...no. I'm not nice to my equipment by any means. (TWO GRIPES!) Velcro straps to cinch bag together, awful. Broke the metal D-rings first time. The anchor straps for the sides are perfect unfortunately it only came with three for 6 sides. I purchased two extra.
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Love how it sets up, but......
customer_reviews.text: Used it 3 times, then on the 4th, the fiberglass rods were popping out of the plastic sockets. Great design, poor construction. Will not purchase another one. I winter camp and not fun fighting it setting it up in freezing cold temps. Pretty sad - I do like the tent, plenty of head room and space, but can't trust it when setting it up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great setup for groups or a family
customer_reviews.text: This is a great setup for anyone fishing in a group. I take families out that may not have the ability or equipment to go go out on their own and it’s the perfect size to give kids a spot to warm up before going back out to play.
customer_reviews.author: Erika D Milan

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until it broke after second use.
customer_reviews.text: We loved this the first two times we used it, then one of the connector joints broke so that one of the poles does not stay in place. Working on contacting Eskimo and will update this review once resolution is reached.
customer_reviews.author: RedBirdsOnTop

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate, buy now
customer_reviews.text: Buy it now! This size fits 4 adults and 4 kids comfortably (as long as your holes are thought of beforehand). We purchased two of the Eskimo chairs to go along with this just need a few more. Turn on our buddy heater when we get cold and it heats up instantly. Can’t believe we’ve been ice fishing without the hut for so long.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnie

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room in this bad boy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this ice house 8 times. It is amazing. By myself I can pop it up in under 2 minutes. Last weekend I fished 7 Guys out of it with 14 holes and we still had room for all of our gear. Could have fit 2 more people if I would have planned out how I drilled the holes. Very warm house as well! Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Strand

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, enough room for three... (crowded with four).. Durable, Bigger storage bag than the older ones, which makes it nicer than 2 guys stuffing it in a zippered bag. You won't need much heat in these insulated shacks. A great ice shack, worth every penny.** Note...** It will not find the fish for you... good luck fishing
customer_reviews.author: JJAYKART

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic portable/ kind of big and bulky.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for the price. This item is much cheaper than the other portable shacks I looked at. I think Eskimo makes great shacks and see no reason to pay so much more for the competition. This shack is big so I don’t plan on hole hopping with it. If you’re a mover, go smaller and more portable. Great size for up to three adults, maybe four if they’re small.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn and Steve

customer_reviews.title: Nice product well made
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product awesome. If there is any sun out warmed up about 20 degrees warmer inside. Well made easy up easy down very quick
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product from an excellent company.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product from Eskimo. Wouldn't expect anything different from them. High quality. Just what I was looking for. Fits in the bag easily. Not sure if they redid the bag as I have read many reviews saying it doesn't fit well but I had no problem. Also on the heavy side for walking long distances to your destination but I have an ATV so no issues there.
customer_reviews.author: Muskie AEvans

customer_reviews.title: Great large ice fishing shelter.
customer_reviews.text: Used in -20 temps with high winds. Kept warm with a big buddy heater. Went up and down easily, well built, fit 10 guys sitting, not fishing, easily. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Just what our family needed. It’s the perfect size. Small enough that my husband can take it out by himself and it doesn’t feel like overkill. Last weekend, We fit 6 adults and two kids in it and we were all perfectly comfortable. It’s easy to set up and easy to take down. And so far, the zippers and fabric have held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this ice house!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! Highly Recommend! Can't believe how fast it goes up! No issues at all keeping all this space warm! Windows galore, plenty of space...I think we're gonna put cots inside to take our afternoon siesta's! I'm 6'3" and can stand up inside as long as I don't walk to the outermost edges...
customer_reviews.author: Jacob J. Parkin

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Just got a chance to use it and it was awesome, easy set up and works great the wind was blowing pretty good and we stayed warm and almost hot I’ll have to rethink the long johns next time take down was easy and went back in the bag with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for 5 of us to go fishing and also to have jigging hole in the hut as well! Definitely look into buying a mr buddy heater as well, the xl heats the hut up very nice when it’s in the single digits or negative temperature out.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing construction.
customer_reviews.text: I've hunted out of many Hub style blinds with similar Construction. The Shanty has quality poles and hubs the only downfall is the the poles are extremely flexible making set up sometimes a little difficult when it's wet and heavy. This is good considering the poles don't break if they get bent. I have had a few hunting blinds where while putting them up the pole would bend and then shatter these poles were almost doubled in half and didn't break I would recommend this product to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Pull the ice trigger!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so excited for Colorado ice fishing. This thing is huge. Pictures are worth a thousand words. Only thing I can say is take your time “popping” out the walls and roof. It’s under a lot of pressure but that’s what make this house so great! Once it’s up, I can tell my season is taken care of. Tons of room and the Mrs. is even ready for ”date-weekend” on the ice!
customer_reviews.author: Choppy

customer_reviews.title: Can't imagine a better shelter
customer_reviews.text: This ice shelter is worth every dime. It is easy to put up, takes the wind and hold the heat (last trip was -16 wind chill and 30-40 mph winds). I can't imagine a better shelter. Ice anchors worked perfectly put in by hand. I wish I had bought this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Flintlock

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: We love our new ice fishing shanty ...It’s also very spacious plenty of room for three or four people .. we got it for a great price and free shipping ..no complaints here
customer_reviews.author: tammy moss

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice Fishing Tent
customer_reviews.text: Great ice fishing tent although 9 people would be a little cramped if you were all fishing. I would say it can comfortably fit 5 or 6 people while gigging. Also stay very warm in side with a small heater even on the coldest days in WI.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas W

customer_reviews.title: IT'S SPACIOUS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Eskimo ice house! It's well insulated so I am kept warm from the harsh icy cold winds! It's spacious! I would recommend getting one if your going ice fishing with a group. Pros: Durable, spacious, insulated, and ease of setup. Cons: Heavy, takes a little time to wrap up, but doable.
customer_reviews.author: Chong

customer_reviews.title: Wow, this is a big shanty!
customer_reviews.text: This shanty is huge!! I have an Eskimo quick fish I bought about 5 years ago and it is a 4-5 person but fits 3 adults. This Fatfish9416i is big enough for the whole family. Goes up easily and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: cjimpala65

customer_reviews.title: Shipping damage to outter box, late, otherwise ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item thru my GF's account, item was late on shipping (to receive) the box was so beat up & damaged was tapped up a few times. The tent it self has minor damage to the carrying case, But after a setup in the livingroom it seems to be in shape, a Lot heavier than what they say it is. Will add more to comments after I take it out on the ice.
customer_reviews.author: gigi nightstalker

customer_reviews.title: Pay a little more for this insulated model. It’s worth it!
customer_reviews.text: High quality materials. Simple to set up and take down. With a small buddy heater it stays very warm. Much bigger than pictures give it justice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awsome seller.great product lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Awsome ice house huge inside I'm 6ft tall and there is room for four full sized persons to fish comfortably. insulated enough to stay warm with just a little mr buddy heater and be in a tea shirt fishing.very well built shanty.great seller fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jp fish alot

customer_reviews.title: but this one is wonderful! Sets up easily and is comfortable with our ...
customer_reviews.text: What a find! My husband does a lot of ice fishing and we have had three different tents/shacks, but this one is wonderful! Sets up easily and is comfortable with our little propane in 10 minutes! Am recommending this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have used this like 5-6 times now and love it. Easy to setup and definitely keeps you warm. I would recommend the insulated version so that there is less condensation. Pair it with a heater buddy and you definitely won’t be cold!! It was -9 last time I used it and was nice and warm inside this shanty.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: The Ultimate Ice Shack
customer_reviews.text: I got the 9416i. It is the ultimate shack for ice fishing with a ridiculous amount of room. The dimensions when assembled are 13’11x8’x6’6”. I could not recommend it more to someone who goes out with buddies and wants some comfort room or to use as a sleeper on the ice.
customer_reviews.author: Lukas

customer_reviews.title: Good shelter
customer_reviews.text: 4 seasons in, works great, still in great shape. Bag is a little small and eyelets on inside make it difficult to anchor during setup in wind. I bought a double hub Eskimo and use that more frequently, even alone because setup and pack up are easier when breezy.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kunkel

customer_reviews.title: Excellant
customer_reviews.text: I absolute love this seller, order came earlier then expected. Was very happy with my purchase. It was so easy to set up. I use it every weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gorr

customer_reviews.title: big on the inside
customer_reviews.text: Took it out for the first time with me son. It was big enough for us to fish three holes and set up a tip up behind us. Still had enough room for heater, vex, and had a 2x4 piece of plywood to lay out fishing tackle and extras to keep off the ice. If i had to i bet 4 people could fish two holes each in here, or if you were tip up fishing you could fit 5 or 6 people. Well worth the money, as long as poles hold up.
customer_reviews.author: peter a.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: We love this shelter! Quick to setup. Plenty of room for family and friends!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Noe

customer_reviews.title: Good shack
customer_reviews.text: Taken it on a few trips so far. Love it. Only thing negative I have to say is mine only came with 2 Tie down straps. You need 4 straps. Ended up buying 2 more
customer_reviews.author: tanner merrill

customer_reviews.title: Insulation makes all the difference
customer_reviews.text: This product is heavy, but it's so worth it. Instead of blasting heat and propane to stay warm, it holds the heat and I use way less propane. It comes with anchors, but the weight helps hold it in place so if its not too windy, I wouldn't waste time to anchor it down. Just pay attention to weather changes if you do that.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S.

customer_reviews.title: Large and Durable Shelter
customer_reviews.text: Received today and naturally had to open in the garage. WOW is this thing massive, but easy to open! The extra money you spend on this HUB shelter is worth it in size and seems to be made well. Hoping to use it this weekend. I will it is big even packed up so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Great shack
customer_reviews.text: Great shack for ice fishing, breaks down and packs away easily! Can fit two adult and two kids in or three guys!
customer_reviews.author: Flip

customer_reviews.title: Good valued shack
customer_reviews.text: Good valued shack. Breaks the wind and keeps heated with ease with a portable catalytic propane heater. Packs up and sets up quickly. It does have some weight to it but I throw it on my atv or in the sled with the other gear and it's not too bad. I had one issue with the shack. The poles somehow got wrapped up in the fabric/hub and I had to take it apart to fix it. The windows fog up like crazy as with anything else like this does. Good buy overall. Not dissapointed at all. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kody

customer_reviews.title: Its just OK.
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room for 2. If you want 3 or more, you will need to leave all your gear outside. It kept the heat in pretty good. We had to turn the portable heater off. Not as easy to set up and take down as indicated. Windows are too high to see out when seated and too low when standing. Made in CHINA :(
customer_reviews.author: Ken Deaton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: Holds heat very well, good quality zippers, roof storage pockets for coats, side pockets are big enough for gloves-hat-phone and then some, great amount of floor space for 2-3 guys, this is honestly the best 235$ I've spent on ice fishing gear. Strongly recommend also buying a 2 burner propane heater for a 20lb tank.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Meads

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it. Would give it 5 stars except the carry bag ripped after about 5 trips
customer_reviews.author: nancy alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and quick delivery!!! Very easy to set up and plenty of room for 2 people and chairs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Waters

customer_reviews.title: Tent goes up fast and stays warm with a small propane
customer_reviews.text: Tent goes up fast and stays warm with a small propane heater. Large enough for 3 or 4 people only thing I don’t like is the weight and size.
customer_reviews.author: A. S. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Extreamly Nice.
customer_reviews.text: At times, too warm. HAHAHA. who says that right. I'm in Colorado, so its not -30-50. This is well worth the money. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Polar Vortex Approved
customer_reviews.text: A gift for an ice fishing fanatic, delivered as promised, all parts accounted for, popped it up outside and everything looked great. Spacious, insulated, and easy to pack up. Winter in Wisconsin won't be so bad when you've got this on the ice. (Picture taken at 830pm)
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Made my husband happy.
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy to set up as advertised, especially when the wind is blowing. Once you get it figured out, gets easier every time. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl J McCulley

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This was well worth the money. I love it. It is easy to put up and take down. It is roomier than I expected. We had 4 camp chairs, three adults and three kids in this and it was plenty of room
customer_reviews.author: Adam Sage

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: 3rd time I used it one of the support bar brackets broke.
customer_reviews.author: Jarvis Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Its Heavy but its way warm and pretty easy to setup and take down repacking it can be a little tuff but its not to bad all in all I am a Happy Customer....
customer_reviews.author: BTA We try to Save your day!!!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: You will not regret this buy, ita a little heavy but beat investment of the year for sure super easy to set up and take down
customer_reviews.author: Jim lahey

customer_reviews.title: Only had this for a month
customer_reviews.text: Well we had this for about 1 month before this happened. I can’t give it too bad of a review though because I’ve had one before and never had a problem. Besides this issue it worked great. Just need to figure out about getting a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Kaley

customer_reviews.title: Best Ice Tent & Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Love this ice tent stays very warm and the customer service was excellent
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lujan

customer_reviews.title: 3 big men can sit in folding chairs and fish comfortably, quality made shelter
customer_reviews.text: Big, 3 big men can sit in folding chairs and fish comfortably, quality made shelter. Put it geup alone in 5 minutes. With a Mr. Heater can get quite warm. I would give it 5 stars but it does not come with a zippered backpack bag ( I would not carry on my back anyway, this thing is huge ), comes with a drawstring bag with 3 cinch straps which work great.
customer_reviews.author: Hoss@ AK49

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful ice shelter.
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of ice fishing and this shelter is amazing. I know it says 7 to 9, but I would say 6 is more realistic. However how many other ice shelters can you say you can fit 6 people in. Heats up quickly and stays warm all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the windows all away around
customer_reviews.text: Was everything we thought it would be, very roomy, and warms up quickly with a heater buddy. Love the windows all away around! Everything about this is perfect, except one thing, It’s SO HEAVY. Lucky we have a jet sled we can put it in so it slides around well, or can be towed. Other then that minor downfall, this tent is literally perfect for the family, or group of friends!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Talmadge

customer_reviews.title: Nice fishing tent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for our son and his family (4). They like the size, warmth and ease of set up. They put it and other supplies on a sled to get to the fishing a area. It has a nice carrying case but is fairly large to carry as described.
customer_reviews.author: Nanaof2

customer_reviews.title: The set up and tear down was amazing and the room it provides for ice fishing is ...
customer_reviews.text: Received my ice hut, (very prompt delivery), and set it up that weekend. The height should have been as tall as the 5 sided and the door is a challenge to get in and out of with full cold weather gear on. The set up and tear down was amazing and the room it provides for ice fishing is great. Very easy to keep warm. Took a few years to get what I wanted, but am happy with the Eskimo ice shelter.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice hub!
customer_reviews.text: Used it a few times this last season as i bought it late. Goes up easily. Well insulated and seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Greggor

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: It works great, had to shut off the heater because it holds in the heat good, sets up easy and quickly. It's quality ice tent.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kopp

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Eskimo ice fishing tent is awesome, easy set up and take down by 1 person, enough room for 3 men with buckets and gear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: We use this tent for ice fishing weekly and absolutely love it! Plenty of room and well insulated! The material is extremely well made!
customer_reviews.author: BST

customer_reviews.title: Love this house
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on your back and carry. Just as easy to put back in the bag and take down.
customer_reviews.author: SegaNeptune

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold and unfold
customer_reviews.text: used to stay warm at home during a house renovation. Spent two winters under. Extremely well insulated. Easy to fold and unfold. And very dark, you can 'close' the windows and it's pitch black
customer_reviews.author: marc B

customer_reviews.title: ... in the begining but all sorted out and I love this. Roomy
customer_reviews.text: A little miscommunication in the begining but all sorted out and I love this. Roomy. Along with a Mr. Buddy heater you say warm and out of the wind. Be sure to reset your tie downs after a while. They melt the ice and me come loose. (Not a big deal)
customer_reviews.author: FishSlayer420

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I ever bought freinds love it the whole crew goes out together easy to heat only downside is putting it back in bag is a pain in the butt way to hard exspeacialy by yourself and it's hard to carry with weight need to make it more like a back pack
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend for hitting the ice
customer_reviews.text: Even un-insulated it is still very warm and protects from the wind well, especially with a heater inside. Very spacious, highly recommend for hitting the ice!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi P

customer_reviews.title: Very good tent
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the tent. Very well made with heavy duty zippers and I really like the numerous windows. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pop up. Roomy and easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: robert tobiasz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Do a lot of ice fishing. Call this the "ice condo" lots of room for at least 5-6 with all the equipment. Easy to set up. I love all Eskimo products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, warm and simple to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this pop up out 3 times this season so far. One time on lake of the woods in -30f actual temps (wind chill was in the -40's). House did just fine with a single sunflower heater. Actually took my jacket off. Takes about 90 seconds to pop up and a couple mins to break down and squeeze back in the bag. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful experience on a pricey product.
customer_reviews.text: It came with the box (both of them) all ripped up/destroyed had 2 large holes in the fabric I had to fix before even taking it out on the ice. I’ve bought Eskimo products before with absolutely 0 problems so that makes me think this is on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Sternat

customer_reviews.title: Nice pop up!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up and take down even by yourself. Do take the time to do a couple test runs at home before going fishing. Heats very well. I'm very happy with this model.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ann Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love the size of this shelter
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of this shelter!! We can have the entire family plus friends and still have room to fish. The set up and tear down are super quick! Which is awesome when it's -15. Retains the heat extremely well! The only down side to this shelter is that it is difficult to put back in the carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: Katarina Brown

customer_reviews.title: great shelter
customer_reviews.text: very easy to set up, it takes about 15 seconds with 2 people
customer_reviews.author: THEFIXMAN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shelter - easy to set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shelter - easy to set up and take down. Nice to have someplace to escape the wind and with the heater it is toasty warm!
customer_reviews.author: Needles62

customer_reviews.title: Eskimo
customer_reviews.text: Good shanty could use some improvements on the limb but works great for ice fishing
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Thanks amazon for the great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome awesome awesome! For a refurbished product, this was a steal. Soooo big inside and keeps us warm.
customer_reviews.author: shihtzumom

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: this thing is awesome. Very easy to use/setup/take down. The amount of space you have compared to the 767 is insane. You can easily fish 4 adults in here. I'm 5'10" and i can walk around inside the whole area without ducking. Very nice shanty!
customer_reviews.author: grant

customer_reviews.title: Spacious, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, only down side is it not being insulated. Still a great shanty with lots of room. Very easy to set up. Has 1 entrance and lots of windows.
customer_reviews.author: Malia Alonzo

customer_reviews.title: So easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great gift for my husband. He and our two children LOVE this tent and the ease of setting it up!
customer_reviews.author: Katie McWhirter

customer_reviews.title: there is no floor and if there is much breeze you better have it tied down
customer_reviews.text: i like the size and how versatile it is. it is light enough to carry and very easy to set up and take down. I used it for fishing but it could easily be used for camping and you can buy some accessories. Floor etc.
customer_reviews.author: James Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and room - keeps with wind out - very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: nice and roomy
customer_reviews.text: very nice tent, and easily fits 3-4 people. No floor in case you are wondering.
customer_reviews.author: EA Person

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the quality and size. It’s even insulated. I recommend this to my coworkers. Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Ayres

customer_reviews.title: Is a good house
customer_reviews.text: Little too much $, bit it keeps me warm in the Minnesota winter
customer_reviews.author: jackie norton

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and take down even on windy ...
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and take down even on windy days by yourself. Lots of room, we fish 4 guys with 2 poles all the time and have plenty of room to move around.
customer_reviews.author: D.Carrier

customer_reviews.title: Huge and durable
customer_reviews.text: Only have used this once so far but love the size. Haven't tried to put 5 people in it but definitely possible. The fabric is extremely durable. Looking forward to the season this year now having this.
customer_reviews.author: TCSchneids

customer_reviews.title: Everything it says and more.
customer_reviews.text: I'm the talk of the ice fishing community now. No more cheesy drafty wood boxes. This thing is huge for 3-4 people. pops up easily. In wind, secure it first. Easy to put back in bag as well. Can carry it on your back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: QUALITY! WELL MADE! I used it for winter camping in 5 degree weather. With a heater buddy inside temperature was between 40 and 50 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm! Great for scuba divers
customer_reviews.text: Zippers are difficult to zip. I'm a scuba diver I cold water diver and it's great to get warm in after a dive during the surface intervals. Love that I don't have to worry about ruining the floor of a tent.
customer_reviews.author: James Gidley

product_meta.title: Eskimo FF6120I FatFish Insulated Pop-up Portable 6-Sided Ice Shelter, 5-7 Person
product_meta.description: Fish more comfortably with more people and more ice gear in the FatFish - the world's first wide-bottom pop-up portable ice fishing shelter. The FatFish is designed to give you up to 80% more fishable area, while offering the same easy set-up and portability as the best-selling line of Eskimo QuickFish shelters. The entire line of FatFish ice shelters are equipped with all metal ball-and-socket design and larger diameter poles, resulting in a stronger and more durable shelter. The FatFish incorporates distinctive X-style reflective highlighting trim into it's agressively styled skin. Includes oversized zippered backpack bag for easy transport.
feature_bullets: The FatFish is designed with two doors on opposite sides of the shelter to allow anglers easy access to the incredibly large fishing area inside
Large, removable window panels with detachable hook and loop windows for 360-degrees of viewing
Fully insulated with IQ Insulated Fabric for 35 percent more warmth. 11mm extra-large poles.
Features reflective trim, and self-tapping ice anchors that are easier to grip and will not bend under pressure. Mesh storage pockets keep essential fishing gear handy
5-7 person capacity with set-up size of 115" x 115" and 78" high and elbow room of 122" x 122"
Two doors featuring quality YKK zippers, on opposite sides of the shelter allow for easy access
10 large, removable window for more viewing configurations
Fully insulated with IQ Insulated Fabric for 35% more warmth
Includes 9 self-tapping ice anchors that are easier to grip and will not bend under pressure

Everything fits into an oversized cinch duffle bag that can easily be carried on your back. The FatFish 6120i offers up to 23% more fishable area than any shelter on the market with similar capacity and size
